A LITTLE BIT ABOUT ME

Argentina, Corrientes

Hi, I'm Diego nice to meet you. I'm passionate about technology since I was a child, but I'm also a business person.

You can call me entrepreneur, programmer, technician, computer scientist, designer or any other title defined by the market.

I would not like to be pigeonholed in a specific branch, I believe that we can diversify and do many things, but at the same time it is not possible to do everything.

My energy is one of my virtues correlated with productivity, perhaps a time paranoid. This leads me to put my enthusiasm in places which give me a progress or advancement on a personal level, this does not mean that I look for an immediate reward...
